column6:
Brand ratings are provided on a 7-point scale, for pairs of brands. 
Thus, B34 is the rating of how similar brands 3 and 4 are perceived to be. That is, from the table at left, how similar brands MDH and the customer's "Ideal" brand are.
A score of 7 indicates that the respondent perceives the two brands are identical, while a score of 1 indicates that the brands are perceived to be very different.
